data.eml:eml: Two new species of Acrocephalomyia Ibáñez-Bernal & Hernández-Ortiz, 2012 from Brazil (Diptera: Ropalomeridae) and a key to known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alvim, Edgar, Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2016): Two new species of Acrocephalomyia Ibáñez-Bernal & Hernández-Ortiz, 2012 from Brazil (Diptera: Ropalomeridae) and a key to known species. Zootaxa 4067 (1): 57-64, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4067.1.4
